name: dragon-extension
description: CLI tool for Dragon Copilot extension development and packaging

scripts.copy-resources: node -e "const fs = require('fs-extra'); fs.copySync('src/schemas', 'dist/schemas'); fs.copySync('src/resources', 'dist/resources', { errorOnExist: false });"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.package: npm run build && pkg dist/cli.js --targets node18-win-x64,node18-macos-x64,node18-linux-x64 --out-path releases && npm run rename-executables
scripts.rename-executables: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); try { fs.renameSync('releases/cli-win.exe', 'releases/dragon-extension-win.exe'); } catch(e) {} try { fs.renameSync('releases/cli-macos', 'releases/dragon-extension-macos'); } catch(e) {} try { fs.renameSync('releases/cli-linux', 'releases/dragon-extension-linux'); } catch(e) {}"
